name: Double Dragon
storyline: Billy and Jimmy Lee, martial arts experts, set out to rescue Billy's girlfriend, Marian, who has been kidnapped by a ruthless gang known as the Black Warriors. Fighting their way through city streets, industrial areas, and enemy hideouts, the brothers confront waves of thugs and powerful bosses, using their skills and weapons they find along the way.
summary: The MS-DOS port of Double Dragon.
